00058 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059  * GUIInstantInductLoop-methods

00061 GUIInstantInductLoop::GUIInstantInductLoop(const std::string& id, OutputDevice& od,
00062         MSLane* const lane, SUMOReal positionInMeters)
00063     : MSInstantInductLoop(id, od, lane, positionInMeters) {}

00066 GUIInstantInductLoop::~GUIInstantInductLoop() {}

00068 
00069 GUIDetectorWrapper*
00070 GUIInstantInductLoop::buildDetectorGUIRepresentation() {
00071     return new MyWrapper(*this, static_cast<GUIEdge&>(getLane()->getEdge()).getLaneGeometry(getLane()), myPosition);
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076  * GUIInstantInductLoop::MyWrapper-methods
00077  * ----------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00078 GUIInstantInductLoop::MyWrapper::MyWrapper(GUIInstantInductLoop& detector,
00079         GUILaneWrapper& wrapper, SUMOReal pos)
00080     : GUIDetectorWrapper("instant induct loop", detector.getID()),
00081       myDetector(detector), myPosition(pos) {
00082     const PositionVector& v = wrapper.getShape();
00083     myFGPosition = v.positionAtLengthPosition(pos);
00084     Line l(v.getBegin(), v.getEnd());
00085     SUMOReal sgPos = pos / v.length() * l.length();
00086     myBoundary.add(myFGPosition.x() + (SUMOReal) 5.5, myFGPosition.y() + (SUMOReal) 5.5);
00087     myBoundary.add(myFGPosition.x() - (SUMOReal) 5.5, myFGPosition.y() - (SUMOReal) 5.5);
00088     myFGRotation = -v.rotationDegreeAtLengthPosition(pos);
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 GUIInstantInductLoop::MyWrapper::~MyWrapper() {}
00093 
00094 
00095 Boundary
00096 GUIInstantInductLoop::MyWrapper::getCenteringBoundary() const {
00097     Boundary b(myBoundary);
00098     b.grow(20);
00099     return b;
00100 }

00104 GUIParameterTableWindow*
00105 GUIInstantInductLoop::MyWrapper::getParameterWindow(GUIMainWindow& app,
00106         GUISUMOAbstractView& /*parent !!! recheck this - never needed?*/) {
00107     GUIParameterTableWindow* ret = new GUIParameterTableWindow(app, *this, 7);
00108     // add items
00109     // parameter
00110     ret->mkItem("position [m]", false, myPosition);
00111     ret->mkItem("lane", false, myDetector.getLane()->getID());
00112     // values
00113     // close building
00114     ret->closeBuilding();
00115     return ret;
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 void
00120 GUIInstantInductLoop::MyWrapper::drawGL(const GUIVisualizationSettings& s) const {
00121     glPushName(getGlID());
00122     SUMOReal width = (SUMOReal) 2.0 * s.scale;
00123     glLineWidth(1.0);
00124     // shape
00125     glColor3d(1, 0, 1);
00126     glPushMatrix();
00127     glTranslated(0, 0, getType());
00128     glTranslated(myFGPosition.x(), myFGPosition.y(), 0);
00129     glRotated(myFGRotation, 0, 0, 1);
00130     glScaled(s.addExaggeration, s.addExaggeration, 1);
00131     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00132     glVertex2d(0 - 1.0, 2);
00133     glVertex2d(-1.0, -2);
00134     glVertex2d(1.0, -2);
00135     glVertex2d(1.0, 2);
00136     glEnd();
00137     glTranslated(0, 0, .01);
00138     glBegin(GL_LINES);
00139     glVertex2d(0, 2 - .1);
00140     glVertex2d(0, -2 + .1);
00141     glEnd();
00142 
00143     // outline
00144     if (width * s.addExaggeration > 1) {
00145         glColor3d(1, 1, 1);
00146         glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_LINE);
00147         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00148         glVertex2f(0 - 1.0, 2);
00149         glVertex2f(-1.0, -2);
00150         glVertex2f(1.0, -2);
00151         glVertex2f(1.0, 2);
00152         glEnd();
00153         glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_FILL);
00154     }
00155 
00156     // position indicator
00157     if (width * s.addExaggeration > 1) {
00158         glRotated(90, 0, 0, -1);
00159         glColor3d(1, 1, 1);
00160         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00161         glVertex2d(0, 1.7);
00162         glVertex2d(0, -1.7);
00163         glEnd();
00164     }
00165     glPopMatrix();
00166     drawName(getCenteringBoundary().getCenter(), s.scale, s.addName);
00167     glPopName();
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00171 GUIInstantInductLoop&
00172 GUIInstantInductLoop::MyWrapper::getLoop() {
00173     return myDetector;
00174 }
